title: Berlin's dangerous fascination with homemade firecrackers and fireworks
subhead: Police unions and doctors' associations are calling for a ban on the private use of pyrotechnic devices, which cause injuries every New Year's Eve. But the German capital defends its libertarian spirit and its festive reputation.

title: China's industrial-scale pig farms encounter new threats
subhead: After a major outbreak of African swine fever in 2018, China massively industrialized its pig farming sector to ensure food self-sufficiency. This giant factory-style model, which wiped out small farmers, is now threatened by overproduction.

title: Fight, the innovative agency behind Zohran Mamdani's New York victory
subhead: The mayor-elect owes his resounding victory in part to the political communications agency. Founded after Kamala Harris' defeat in the presidential election, Fight aims to embody the future of the Democratic Party. This renewal is anchored on the left and driven by outsider candidates and creative campaign ads.

title: Dog photographer, a new niche profession: 'The key is to avoid the tongue hanging out'
subhead: Even though the photo galleries of their 'parents' are typically replete with dog photos, a new generation of professional photographers is nonetheless making a living out of artfully crafted canine portraits.

title: Europe's dramatic decline in pharmaceutical production threatens health sovereignty
subhead: The rise of China and India, combined with protectionist pressure from the Trump administration, is redrawing the global map of the pharmaceutical industry. The Europe-wide deindustrialization that began in the 2000s is now accelerating.
